lab6Elections

Class VoteRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab6Elections.VoteRecorder

  • public class VoteRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the names for the candidates for both president and vice-president Records the total amount of votes Allows the names for candidates to be changed, but only when the number of votes is 0 for all candidates Allows the votes to be reset. Can return the standings for the election Records the vote for a specific voter
    Author:
    Ylva

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean confirmed
      placeholder, will be deleted later
      private int myVoteForPresident
      This is the vote that this specific person has cast for president If 0 this means no vote is cast, if 1 or 2 it means that candidate for president
      private int myVoteForVicePresident
      This is the vote that this specific person has cast for vice president If 0 this means no vote is cast, if 1 or 2 it means that candidate for vice president
      private static java.lang.String nameCandidatePresident1
      Name of the first candidate for president.
      private static java.lang.String nameCandidatePresident2

      Name of the first Vice President candidate.
      private static java.lang.String nameCandidateVicePresident2
      Name of the second Vice President Candidate.
      private int voteID
      The voteID, can be used to figure out what voter this is, defaults to voters +1
      private static int voters
      Holds the amount of total voters, this is used to calculate the next voteID in case a voter does not vote for a president of vice president
      private static int votesCandidatePresident1
      Total amount of votes that have been cast for the first candidate for president.
      private static int votesCandidatePresident2
      Total amount of votes that have been cast for the second candidate for president.
      private static int votesCandidateVicePresident1
      Total amount of votes that have been cast for the first candidate for vice president.
      private static int votesCandidateVicePresident2
      Total amount of votes that have been cast for the second candidate for vice president.

    • Method Detail

      • setCandidatesPresident

        public static boolean setCandidatesPresident(java.lang.String candidate1,
                                             java.lang.String candidate2)
        Only works if the amount of votes for the president is equal to 0 This in order to prevent fraud during the election
        Parameters:
        candidate1 - Name that you want to set the first candidate of president to
        candidate2 - Name that you want to set the second candidate of president to
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if the amount of votes was not equal to 0

      • setCandidatesPresident

        public static boolean setCandidatesPresident(int index,
                                             java.lang.String name)
        Only works if the amount of votes for the president is equal to 0 This in order to prevent fraud during the election
        Parameters:
        index - 1 or 2 depending on which candidate for president to change
        name - the name to change the name of the candidate towards
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if the amount of votes was not equal to 0 or the index was of a wrong format

      • setCandidatesPresident

        public static boolean setCandidatesPresident(java.lang.String first1,
                                             java.lang.String last1,
                                             java.lang.String first2,
                                             java.lang.String last2)
        Sets the names of the presidential candidates by combining their first and last name Only works if the amount of votes for the president is equal to 0 This in order to prevent fraud during the election
        Parameters:
        first1 - first name of the first candidate
        last1 - last name of the first candidate
        first2 - first name of the second candidate
        last2 - last name of the second candidate
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if the amount of votes was not equal to 0

      • setCandidatesPresident

        public static boolean setCandidatesPresident(int index,
                                             java.lang.String first,
                                             java.lang.String last)
        Only works if the amount of votes for the president is equal to 0 This in order to prevent fraud during the election
        Parameters:
        index - 1 or 2 depending on which candidates name to change
        first - first name that you want the new candidate to have
        last - last name that you want the new candidate to have
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if the amount of votes was not 0 or the index was not 1 or 2

      • setCandidatesVicePresident

        public static boolean setCandidatesVicePresident(java.lang.String candidate1,
                                                 java.lang.String candidate2)
        Only works if the amount of votes for the president is equal to 0 This in order to prevent fraud during the election
        Parameters:
        candidate1 - Name that you want to set the first candidate of vice president to
        candidate2 - Name that you want to set the second candidate of vice president to
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if the amount of votes was not equal to 0

      • resetVotes

        public static void resetVotes()
        Resets all the votes to 0, Also sets the amount of voters to 0

      • getCurrentVotePresident

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentVotePresident()
        Returns a string with a , as delimiter with the votes for both candidates for presidents
        Returns:
        string in the format [votesPresident1,votesPresident2]

      • getCurrentVoteVicePresident

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentVoteVicePresident()
        Returns a string with a , as delimiter with the votes for both candidates for Vice Presidents
        Returns:
        string in the format [votesVicePresident1,votesVicePresident2]

      • getAndConfirmVotes

        public void getAndConfirmVotes()

      • getAVote

        private static int getAVote(java.lang.String name1,
                            java.lang.String name2)
        Gets a single vote for either the president or for the vice president. It uses the names of the candidates to check if it should ask for the vice president vote or for the president vote
        Parameters:
        name1 - Name of the first candidate, this must be a valid name for either the president or the vice president
        name2 - Name of the second candidate, this must be a valid name for either the president or the vice president
        Returns:
        0 if no vote cast, 1 if vote cast for name1, 2 if vote cast for name2

      • getVotes

        private static java.lang.String getVotes()
        A method to get votes for this person for both the president and the vice president
        Returns:
        a string in the format [votePresident,voteVicePresident], where both votes are either 0 or 1 or 2

      • confirmVotes

        private static boolean confirmVotes(int president,
                                    int vicePresident)
        Method that checks with the voter if his votes are correct
        Parameters:
        president - 1 for the first candidate, a 2 for the second candidate for president
        vicePresident - 1 for the first candidate, a 2 for the second candidate for president
        Returns:
        true if the vote was confirmed to be true, false if the vote was incorrect

      • recordVotes

        private static void recordVotes()
